parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not automatically disqualifying, it suggests the post might not be directly linked to an official campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post uses hashtags #echipapentruilfovdeputați, #AlegeVoceaRațiunii, #GyőzzönAJózanÉsz, and #UDMR.  The hashtags clearly refer to the UDMR party and implicitly promote their candidates for the Ilfov County parliamentary elections.  This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience based on the provided insights data.  The use of hashtags also indicates an attempt to reach a broad audience, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The hashtags and the overall message strongly suggest an electoral objective. The phrases "Echipa pentru Ilfov" and "Alege Vocea Rațiunii" directly encourage voters to support the UDMR candidates. The use of paid advertising further amplifies this intent to influence the vote. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The content is not journalistic in nature. It lacks objective reporting or analysis. Instead, it promotes a specific political party and its candidates.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a clear political advertisement aimed at swaying voters.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2968688483294798</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id 2968688483294798, is a paid advertisement clearly promoting the UDMR party and its candidates for the Ilfov County parliamentary elections.  The hashtags directly encourage voters to support the UDMR. The targeting data shows a broad reach, indicating an attempt to influence a large number of voters.  While lacking a CMF number, the other elements strongly suggest this is electoral propaganda.  The post's objective is to increase votes for UDMR candidates.  The post's timing, after the official campaign period, is a crucial factor.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Demeter András István</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>UDMR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
RMDSZ/UDMR, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 2968688483294798) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu hashtag-uri precum #echipapentruilfovdeputați și #UDMR, care promovează în mod direct candidații UDMR pentru alegerile parlamentare din Ilfov, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea acestora.  Conținutul reclamei, lipsit de caracter jurnalistic, constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
